Continue to keep an open mind until you resume your deliberations on Monday, the 12 of you. If you have any issues that arise regarding either COVID or any issues of concern, you contact Ms. Williams and she'll communicate to me if there are any issues. I wish you a very happy holiday, a restful time with your families, and we'll see you on Monday. Thank you so much. Happy holidays. (Continued on next page) SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C.
